item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: Nvidiaâ€™s AI-powered scaling makes old games look better without a huge performance hit (3 minute read) Nvidia’s latest game-ready driver includes a tool called Deep Learning Dynamic Super Resolution (DLDSR) that can make most games look sharper.
